title: Champ Select Freezing / Crashing
body: This has happened to me three times over the last day and a half. i get into champ select and it either freezes or crashes and its pissing me off. I have lost about 13 Lp total and i could've been in promos if it hadn't have happened. Is there someway to implement something that where if your client crashed you don't lose the lp?

replies.body: it needs to save your instance and allow you to rejoin. it's happened twice today, now i'm on a 30 min delay to requeue.

When you crash during champion select, do you receive any error messages like a bug splat?  Are you doing anything specifically when it happens, like adjusting your champion masteries?  This could happen for several reasons from connection to corrupt game files, so anything can help rule out possibilities.  Let me know!
Get a life and stop lying to people.
